bio: I am a Web3 community builder and space host with my own small community
contributionDescription: As a space host on Twitter I have spoke many times about Optimism over the last 6 months and have advised my community to interact on tghe network and gain what blockchain education & rewards they can. I have also advised developer friends to apply for grants. As a member of the community I have also naturally liked, retweeted & supported every OP tweet I manage to see and have made what transactions I could  afford to
